title: Introduction to Interpersonal Skills
headline: Learn about the influence of interpersonal skills on communicating effectively at work with this free online course.
description: This free online interpersonal skills introduction course will guide you through the fundamentals of strong interpersonal skills. Learn how to develop important soft skills for personal success, showcase your skills effectively on your job applications, and properly communicate using verbal and non-verbal communication. Start this course today to improve your knowledge of soft people skills to interact with others and communicate effectively.
courseDescription:
Learn how to develop your strong interpersonal skills set with this free online course, "Introduction to Interpersonal Skill". Discover the essence of good interpersonal skills in the workplace and how to stand out from the crowd with your job applications. In this course, you will begin with an introduction to the importance of interpersonal skill to get ahead in life and the essential emotional intelligence skills required.

Then, you will study ways of developing your interpersonal skills and showcasing them on the job applications. You will also learn about the requirements for public speaking and better presentations. Next, you will discuss effective interpersonal communication skills, includng the right technology for effective communication and intercultural awareness. Finally, you will learn about the role of body language in communication and how to interpret the messages behind various hand and body gestures.

This free online course from Alison will give you an insight into the fundamentals of good interpersonal skills for improving relationships in and out of the workplace. This course is ideal for students, researchers, employers, and professionals who are interested in improving their interpersonal skills. Check out this course today and learn how to enhance your interpersonal communication skills in no time.
